item.description:
Brisk Winter Walks 2009

Hartford Area Hiking is listing the Great Meadows Conservation Trust Winter Walks.
The hikes will be offered by Larry Lunden.

You may register for the hike here, but direct any questions to Larry.

This is the schedule for the Great Meadows Conservation Trust
winter walks for 2009, co-sponsored with the Connecticut
Audubon Society Center at Glastonbury and the Eleanor Buck Wolf
Nature Center in Wethersfield.

Saturday, January 10, 2009 10:00 a.m. Wethersfield. Meet Jim Woodworthon MiddletownAve south of Maple Street. Our hikeinto Wood Parcel and continue through farming fields along Beaver Brook.

Walks will last 1 to 2 hours. Dress for the Weather and ground
conditions. Many places will be muddy. Weather and water
conditions may revise or cancel. Call the CT Audubon Society
for the latest information, 633-8402. Free. Donations will be
accepted.

To see Larry's profile, go here:
http://www.meetup.com...
item.how_to_find_us: You will be hiking with Larry
